Cyber Claw:




Cyber Claw kept her shoulder pinned to the door. She wasn't calming, even if 
the Maximals ordered her to. But she never obeyed orders. Not even 
Megatron's. She went along with it if she was sure he was going to take her 
head off, but there was on way in the Inferno she was going to follow a low 
Maximals order. She was going to be no longer a follower. She was in charge 
of herself.

She eyed every one of the Maximals in the room. The weapons in their hands 
weren't helping her mood, either. She had her back arched and her hands on 
the door.

"I don't talk," she replied to Tavatron. "Just get me out of here! Open this 
door!"

She could always try to do it by force, but she wasn't going to risk the 
damage. It wasn't going to do her any good if she was to run out back into 
the Wild damaged. That was a rule.
